awards:
第81届威尼斯电影节(2024)
　　地平线单元奖 最佳影片(提名) 迈赫迪·巴索伊

　　第39届马德普拉塔电影节(2024)
　　国际竞赛单元 最佳长片奖(提名) 迈赫迪·巴索伊

director.name: 迈赫迪·巴索伊 Mehdi M. Barsaoui

introduction: Aya, a thirty-something Tunisian woman, lives in Tozeur, at the gateway to the desert. Between social dictates, family pressures and disillusionment, Aya is not the happiest girl in the world. One day, misfortune befalls her. Aya doesn’t know it yet but it will be the most beautiful thing that has ever happened to her. It’s an unexpected opportunity for this young woman to start from scratch, to start her life all over again. Aya will never be the same person again.
